a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Per capita GHG emissions vs. per capita CO₂ emissions, 2023
Emissions are measured in tonnes of carbon dioxide-equivalents. Emissions from land-use change and forestry
Per capita CO₂ emissions (tonnes per person)
Per capita greenhouse gas emissions (tonnes of CO₂ equivalents per person)
Data source: Jones et al. (2024); Population based on various sources (2024)
